Dear Category Finance,
Annual Bonus for {!AF_Bonus_Summary__c.Brand_Name__c} has been approved by {!AF_Bonus_Summary__c.LastModifiedBy} and is now ready for a Purchase Order to be issued to the agency. Please log into the Agency Fees Application and run your Purchase Order Report. This will include essential details required for raising your Purchase order in Ariba.
{!AF_Bonus_Summary__c.AF_Internal_Link__c}
From, CMCO Finance
